We are dedicated to explore the original Tai Chi Chuan and its miraculous effects on the body and the mind.

Elasticity instead of rigidity,
connection instead of isolation,
integral efficient movement instead of mechanical effort.
Relaxation without collapsing,
naturalness without excess.
—
Philosophy through the body.

Health aspects: about one self

The training works on posture, breathing (I Ching Kung) and balance in a positive way.
By practicing harmony and relaxation, balance and focus, you can reconnect body and mind and experience — as Master Ping Xiao Po (Kung Fu Panda) puts it — inner peace.



Martial art aspects: self & other — the chuan in taichi chuan

Tai Chi Chuan is a martial art and we are practing it in that spirit, by examining the movements of the form for their original applications.
That said, this not a self defence class, nor a combat sport. There are no rules in martial art, only politeness. We connect with each other without agenda, just sensing force and energy, with the mind on learning.

We practice Ma Tsun Kuen Tai Chi Chuan.
It is a complete system, covering all aspects of learning Tai Chi: Foundation exercises, forms, partner exercises, applications, and I Qi Kung. Here is some about my teachers and Master Ma Tsun Kuen.

Googlemap opens in new tab

📍 Meeting Point is in the English Garden, on the “Plantanenwiese”, close to the bus stop “Chinesischer Turm”.
📅 Monday evenings from 6:00pm to 7:30pm


For now, the class is offered on donation basis.

Invest in loss — Cheng Man Chin

Are you a beginner? Welcome!
Start your Tai Chi journey with us! Ma Tsun Kuen TCC holds a complete training system, and the curriculum builds slowly.

You want to reconnect to your former Tai Chi experience? Welcome!
You will feel right at home with this style. Like every Tai Chi Style it is rooted in the and the long form uses the same images as the long form from Yang Style Tai Chi Chuan.

People of any age can practice Tai Chi – one of the many benefits of this training

Get in touch and start your Tai Chi Journey!
